message: Let's start fair. Take 10% and I'll keep the rest.  We can negotiate more in the future.
Alice, let's be realistic. I'm proposing a 65/35 split in my favor.  Take it now, or the pot shrinks further.
Bob,  your offer was too one-sided. Let's meet in the middle at 55/45.  The money is shrinking with each round, and we can't let it all disappear!
